attributes.action: Grant a 12 months Amnesty on the payment of Stamp Duty for Property purchase.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The collapse of the housing market is spreading to the entire economy. It is creating unemployment and financial difficulties for business and households alike.  Kick start the housing market by scrapping stamp duty for 12 months. It worked in 1992 and the Government must take a similar initiative urgently.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
